mapper.select: SELECT sr.seat_id AS seatId, sr.start_time AS startTime, sr.end_time AS endTime, u.username AS username FROM seats_reservations sr JOIN users u ON sr.u_no = u.no WHERE sr.u_no = #{userNo} ORDER BY sr.end_time DESC, sr.start_time DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT sr.seat_id, u.username, sr.start_time, sr.end_time FROM seats_reservations sr JOIN users u ON sr.u_no = u.no WHERE sr.end_time > NOW()
mapper.update: UPDATE seats_reservations SET end_time = DATE_ADD(end_time, INTERVAL #{minutes} MINUTE) WHERE u_no = #{userNo} AND end_time > NOW() ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 1
UPDATE seats_reservations SET end_time = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL #{minutes} MINUTE) WHERE u_no = #{userNo} AND start_time = end_time ORDER BY start_time DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.select: SELECT u_no FROM ( SELECT *, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY seat_id ORDER BY start_time DESC) AS rn FROM seats_reservations ) sr WHERE rn = 1 AND seat_id IN (SELECT seat_id FROM seats WHERE seat_status = 1);

SELECT sr.no, sr.seat_id, sr.u_no, sr.start_time, sr.end_time, u.username, u.id as user_id FROM seats_reservations sr JOIN users u ON sr.u_no = u.no WHERE sr.seat_id = #{seatId} AND DATE(sr.start_time) = CURDATE() ORDER BY sr.start_time DESC
